LanguageData.DMS_Drone_Hound.label: hound
LanguageData.DMS_Drone_Hound.description: A deployable combat robot with capacity to using small firearms. commonly known as Eutherians, these non-humanoid robots were widely used in various proxy wars during the Cold War when electronic control systems were not yet perfect.
LanguageData.DMS_Drone_Hound.tools.head.label: head
